THANKS
---------

Thanks Glace, the Chinese python author made an early progress on chinese programming on python.

Thanks HYRY, his little script make this project come true.

Thanks JiaHua Huang, he brings universal variable and interpreter into my vision,

Thanks for all of you let zhpy could catch up with python's exciting features.

Thank Paul T. McGuire, his pyparsing module is heavily used in zhpy.

Thanks Swroop C. H for his wonderful book "Byte of Python",

Thanks C.C. license to let me able to remix and made the free Traditional 
Chinese version of "Byte of Python".

For all of this contribution we could get "Byte of zhpy" in a short period of time.


Thanks people who intrested in zhpy and give me helpful advices to improve zhpy.

--
gasolin
